title: This guy made a movie using only LoL maps and characters... And it's really good!!!

embed.description: With this video, I tried something different, no gameplay just cinematics with a decent story ( hopefully haha ). Really hope you enjoy this one. All kind of feedback is truly appreciated!

body:
This guy is an absolute beast. Strongly recommend you check him out and give him some love :D

Riot take note, this is how your skin releases should be like!!!
